classifications.description: SERVICE DEGRADATION: service is operational but slow or with some features disabled
SERVICE OUTAGE: service is unexpectedly unavailable
PLANNED MAINTENANCE: will impact service availability, at least two days' advance notice
EMERGENCY MAINTENANCE: will impact service availability, less than two days' advance notice
SECURITY NOTICE: security warnings and notifications
SERVICE NOTICE: general notes about service issues that are not incidents

impacted_services.description: Print Services (Network Printing and Print Metering)

modifiers.description: UPDATE: prefix to previous subject when sending an update to an existing issue
RESOLVED: prefix to previous subject when notifying that an issue has been resolved
CANCELED: prefix to previous subject when notifying of cancellation of planned maintenance
REMINDER: prefix to previous subject when sending a reminder about planned maintenance
HEADS-UP: prefix to subject when serious outage or degradation is suspected but not confirmed
RE-SCHEDULED: prefix to subject when a Maintenance must be re-scheduled
